data.title: Is Conny Van Dyke related in any way to Dick Van Dyke?
data.meta_description:
While Jerry Van Dyke ( brother of Dick Van Dyke) and I were
making an appearance on a special "Merv Griffin Show" at Cesar's
Palace in Las Vegas in the 70s, Jerry said something like, "I think
we're related. Let me make a call." He called his manager or a
relative. Minutes later he said to me, "I guess we are related!
Seems that my father and your grandfather were brothers or
cousins!" To which I said, "Great; now you tell me!" To the best of
my knowledge, this is true.
data.text: While Jerry Van Dyke ( brother of Dick Van Dyke) and I were making an appearance on a special "Merv Griffin Show" at Cesar's Palace in Las Vegas in the 70s, Jerry said something like, "I think we're related. Let me make a call." He called his manager or a relative. Minutes later he said to me, "I guess we are related! Seems that my father and your grandfather were brothers or cousins!" To which I said, "Great; now you tell me!" To the best of my knowledge, this is true.
